title: There was unexpected error had occurred. Plz try again later.
body:
There was unexpected error had occurred. Plz try again later. 

I am keep getting this message and can't even go into the lobby.
What can I do about this error? 
I tried so many things to fix it, but still not working

replies.body: When you load the client, after the little loading bar finishes, it'll go to a black screen. Hit the "x" in the top right corner before the error message pops up, and then click "log out". It'll restart the client and hopefully load you into the new client!

> [{quoted}](name=Black Fox,realm=NA,application-id=okOuNvuT,discussion-id=VQKTVyiE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-10-16T16:20:23.158+0000)
>
> When you load the client, after the little loading bar finishes, it'll go to a black screen. Hit the "x" in the top right corner before the error message pops up, and then click "log out". It'll restart the client and hopefully load you into the new client!

Alternatively if you can't get to the X in time, pressing ALT + F4 while the error is displayed will also give you the prompt for Sign Out.

If you continue having issues, please reach out on the Support Site and submit a ticket so my colleagues and I can look into it further.

happens the same to me and tried everything: DNS,restarting,reinstalling, ALT+F4....
Already submit a ticket to Riot but no answer.... I download the hextech repair tool and send the files so im here waiting to see if Riot answers how many days it takes?
